channel.title: testing on Postmortem
channel.description: Recent content in testing on Postmortem

item.title: Testing Entire Jungle
item.description: You wanted a banana but what you got was a gorilla holding the banana and the entire jungle In order to create a modular classes, a lot people compose several layers of abstractions.

item.title: Exploding Image
item.description: On my last summer intern, I was assigned to a bug fixing job. It seems not a big deal at first. Only fixing timeout while uploading image. But, when I try to add timeout to 1 min, still got a timeout.
